R Shinny apps for my Packages

ðŸ“¦ My R Packages

Below are the R packages I have developed or contributed to. These packages address various statistical modeling and data analysis challenges, particularly for longitudinal and survival data.

ðŸ”¹ MIIPW

Description:
An R package for fitting Generalized Estimating Equations (GEE) with missing data using a combination of Mean Score (MS), Inverse Probability Weighting (IPW), and Multiple Imputation (MI).

  • ðŸ“¦ CRAN (Coming Soon)
  • ðŸ”— GitHub
  • ðŸ“„ Documentation

ðŸ”¹ jmBIG

Description:
A flexible and scalable joint modeling toolkit for large longitudinal and survival datasets. Supports JMbayes2, rstanarm, joineRML, and FastJM.

  • ðŸ”— GitHub

ðŸ”¹ jmtwostage

Description:
Implements two-stage joint modeling of longitudinal and survival outcomes for scenarios where traditional joint models may be computationally heavy.

  • ðŸ”— GitHub

ðŸ”¹ jmbdirect

Description:
Direct estimation approach for joint modeling with longitudinal and time-to-event data using Bayesian and semiparametric techniques.

  • ðŸ”— GitHub
